description:
Shorts for trails, playgrounds or exploring a lakeshores on a paddleboard. Made from a quick-drying nylon blend that has easy stretch, the Explorer Summertime shorts are ready for long days under wide-open skies.

  • Lightweight nylon feels cool against the skin and dries quickly
  • DWR finish helps these shorts brush off dust from the trail and shed light rain
  • UPF 50+ blocks UV during long days under the sun
  • Dual hand pockets keep small must-haves close
  • Pockets have mesh lining that dries quickly
  • Elasticised waistband with an internal drawcord adjusts the fit to keep up with growth spurts
  • Name label inside
name: MEC Explorer Summertime Shorts - Boys' - Youths
